providing an overview of amazon web services for sap customers the aws sap relationship started in
early 2008 when sap began using aws themselves as a customer sap continues
to use aws today for a variety of use cases including running sap demo
developer and training systems on aws offering trials and developer editions
of many of their solutions on aws via the sap cloud appliance library
sap also uses aws for some of their solution offerings
for example the sap national security services organization runs sap success
factors for the national security community in the aws gulf cloud region
aws began our sap partnership in early 2011 as an sap global technology partner
since 2011 aws and sap have worked closely
together to certify the aws cloud for sap solutions and to develop innovative
solutions to enable sap customers to accelerate their digital transformations
the aws cloud platform provides sap customers many benefits
aws currently offers over 90 cloud services our breadth and depth of services enable
organizations to improve business efficiency and more easily integrate their sap
application workloads with emerging technologies like iot artificial intelligence and big data
running your sap workloads on aws enables you to reduce total cost of
ownership with aws you have access to low-cost it infrastructure that you can
rapidly provision and de-provision on demand helping to minimize the overhead associated with hardware maintenance
cloud security at aws is the highest priority as an aws customer you will
benefit from a data center and network architecture built to meet the requirements of the most security
sensitive organizations aws cloud compliance and assurance programs enable customers to understand
the robust controls in place at aws to maintain security and data protection in
the cloud aws and sap have worked together closely to certify the aws cloud platform so sap
customers can be ensured that they will receive the same level of support from sap when running on aws as they do today
sap products based on sap netweaver 7.0 or higher have been certified and are
fully supported by sap for production on aws these include solutions like sap
business suite applications sap business warehouse sap s 4hana bw for hana and
many others sap database solutions including sap hana sap ase iq and replication server
and the sap mobile solutions are also all supported on aws
all of the x86 operating system platforms supported by sap are supported
for running sap solutions on aws and all of the database platforms supported by
sap for netweaver-based solutions including sql server oracle database and
the others are also supported on aws
the amazon elastic compute cloud or ec2 is a web service that provides secure
resizable compute capacity in the cloud the aws on-demand cloud platform has
been certified to meet the high-performance requirements of sap hana and is fully supported by sap for
production hana workloads aws enables you to provision infrastructure for sap hana on demand
with no required upfront cost commitment or lead time with aws you only pay for the amount of
infrastructure you provision and only for the amount of time needed ec2 instance types are available and
certified for sap hana with up to 4 terabytes of memory for scale-up systems and up to 34 terabytes for scale-out
systems with plans for larger instance types in the near future
the aws cloud is built on a global infrastructure comprised of regions and
availability zones the region is a physical location in the world where we have multiple availability zones
availability zones consist of one or more discrete data centers each with redundant power networking and
connectivity housed in separate facilities availability zones offer you the ability
to operate production applications and databases which are much more highly available fault tolerant and scalable
than would be possible from a single data center the aws cloud currently operates 44
availability zones within 16 geographic regions around the world with plans for
14 more availability zones and five more regions in china france hong kong sweden
and a second aws gulf cloud region in the us
to help you begin your journey to the cloud we have created a set of resources to assist you
on the sap section of the aws website you can find sap white papers blog posts
and frequently asked questions covering topics like sap on aws migration
operations backup recovery licensing high availability and disaster recovery
you can also find aws infrastructure pricing estimates for sample sap architectures
to accelerate and simplify the deployment of sap hana on aws we have built the sap hana quick start reference
deployment that automates the provisioning of all of the required aws infrastructure
components for an sap hana system
the sap rapid migration test program is a set of processes and procedures and tools sap developed in collaboration
with aws to help customers understand the cost effort potential risk and business value
of migrating sap solutions to sap hana with this program the test migration of
an sap solution from any database to sap hana can be completed in days versus
weeks or months compared to other infrastructure options a test migration
to sap hana aws can be done with minimal infrastructure costs since you only need
to pay for the amount of infrastructure required and only for the amount of time needed without a long-term commitment
